1.Title: Snakes on a Plane
1.Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips, Rachel Blanchard
1.Plot: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and poisonous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

2.Title: The Notebook
2.Actors: Gena Rowlands, James Garner, Rachel McAdams, Ryan Gosling
2.Plot: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.

3.Title: The Avengers
3.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
3.Plot: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. brings together a team of super humans to form The Avengers to help save the Earth from Loki and his army.

4.Title: Finding Nemo
4.Actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
4.Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
